data.title: Metal & Fiberglass Fabrication Near You
data.meta_description: Our metal & fiberglass fabricators are here to help you get your project done right, Oregon! Our Woodburn location is ready to start!
data.text:
Located in Marion County, Oregon, our Woodburn facility sits conveniently between Salem and Portland. We operate 5 service centers across the Western United States including our Woodburn location, between the 5 and 99 freeways. This convenient location services all of Oregon with quick and direct access to Clackamas and Multnomah County to the North, and Lane County to the South. Grating Pacific, LLC provides unparalleled metal and fiberglass fabrication services across the state of Oregon. We are here to help you with all of your metal grating needs. We provide design, fabrication, and logistical support for your project, regardless of the size.

Contact Us:

(800) 942-4041

(503) 980-2060

2775 N. Front Street

Woodburn, OR 97071

Directions from the North:

Take I5-S to Salem

Take Exit 282 toward Portland/Hubbard Hwy

Continue onto OR-551 S

Turn left onto OR-99E S

Turn right onto G St.

Turn left onto 3rd St.

Continue onto N Front St.

After 1.6 mi. turn right

Turn right at the intersection

Turn left at the intersection

Turn right at the intersection

The destination is on your left

Directions from the South:

Take I5-N to Portland

Take Exit 271 for OR-214

Turn right onto OR-214

After 1.5 mi. turn left

Turn left onto N Front St.

After 0.5 mi. turn left

Turn right at the intersection

Turn left at the intersection

Turn right at the intersection

The destination is on your left

Directions from the East:

Take OR-99 W

Merge onto OR-18 E

Turn right onto OR-219 S

Turn left onto McKay Rd.

Turn right onto Case Rd.

Turn left onto St. Paul Hwy

Turn right onto Butteville Rd.

Turn left onto Crosby Rd.

Turn right onto N Front St.

After 0.5 mi. turn right

Turn right at the intersection

Turn left at the intersection

Turn right at the intersection

The destination is on your left

Directions from the West:

Head west on OR-211

Continue onto Mt. Hood Ave.

After 1 mi. turn right

Turn left onto N Front St.

After 0.5 mi. turn left

Turn right at the intersection

Turn left at the intersection

Turn right at the intersection

The destination is on your left
